attributes.title: Worst app ever!!!
attributes.review: Y’all don’t download. It will cause you to turn into a yellow potatoe🤢. And it made me try a trend where you throw your grandma out the window. She’s in the ER because of this app. Absolutely horrible. Lastly my great white started tweaking in fro t of me. Absolutely traumatic. If I could give this a zero I would. This app changed my life for the worse. DON’T DOWNLOAD. I BEG YOU

attributes.title: Awful app. So confusing and hard to use.
attributes.review: I cant figure out all of these buttons on this app?!? Some of them keep translating to Russian and when I searched “Russian bounty on US soldiers” the whole app just crashes 🤬 I went to the help section and it just told me to leave if I didn’t like it there. So unhelpful! I do NOT recommend.

attributes.title: Worst app ever.
attributes.review: The app runs ridiculously slow. It makes my phone lag so much it’s so irritating opening the app every time seeing the amount of ads it has on it. I get so many notifications FROM this app the out the day it’s annoying. I wouldn’t recommend this app at all. This app is broken.

attributes.title: My slip and slide Glock 300 super sucker
attributes.review:
This app is so buggy that it gave me COVID-19 it’s the worst app by the worst president 😔 it’s like chair 🧚🏻‍♂️❤️ but make it Electric ⚡️  ans like awesome 💗♥️🧚 replace 'some' with 'ful' ♥️💗🧚🖕This hope this app  shoots for the moon 💕🌈🧚‍♂️and never come back😘🌸✨ D for Did you get the message, we need you to stop🧚‍♂️💞👑🧞‍♀️🧚‍♂️like stop everything. attributes.title: THE CAUCASITY
attributes.review: App is filled with belligerent and intolerable idiocy. Racist, misogynistic, homophobic, and overall orange??? Such a disgusting app. I rather scroll through an endless Craigslist page about screwdrivers than use this app. Very worthless. Can’t do anything right on it. Seems almost like it breaks down on it’s own to avoid confrontation. Very confused as to why this app exists.

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: It took my things (info) and started glitching in my phone it was the worst time of my life my phone kept shutting off glitching and it’s annoying I hate this app it’s not worth the space or time I had to buy a new phone bc of this please please please don’t download this it’s so horrible I regret it so much

attributes.title: waste of time!!
attributes.review: I downloaded this app in hopes of contributing to the community. But all it wanted me to do is endorse a literal racist Cheeto! I didn’t even know something that orange could be racist. Anyways I’m sure this app made my intelligence go down!!! If I paid for this I would ask for my money back!!! And I would’ve fought tooth and nail to get it back!!

attributes.title: I am very ashamed
attributes.review: A few years ago I went to DC for one of your rallies it was the worst experience ever your supporters treat each other like trash you treat other human beings like trash and I am ashamed to call you our president stick to being a businessman President Trump you’re better at that free Barron Trump 2020 I wish I could give it a zero star review

attributes.title: The Absolute Worst App Ever
attributes.review: i opened this app and saw an orange cheeto 🤢 i was so disgusted and shocked that they have faces🤮🤮 after i downloaded this app my phone started to say things like “TrUmP 2020 bUt oN a GRaVe stOne” then everything around me started to float🤕My mom passed out when she saw the app😧😧 this app is the worst app ever it gave my phone a bunch of bugs and problems 😪😪

attributes.title: Worst app ever
attributes.review: This app killed my cat. He was fine and then every time I got on here he would have seizures and I brought him to the vet and she said it was because the gamma rays that came off the app was just making him violently ill and that he was going to die. Don’t ever get this app. It will kill your animals and probably you too.
